title: Learn to code: AI could mean boom times for software developers
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) could, in time, create more jobs for software developers rather than eliminate them, according to investment bank Morgan Stanley.
content:
NEW YORK: Artificial intelligence (AI) could, in time, create more jobs for software developers rather than eliminate them, according to investment bank Morgan Stanley.
"The rise of AI-powered coding tools is not eliminating jobs – it's creating new ... [1699 chars]

title: China offers tech giants cheap power to boost domestic AI chips, FT reports
description: China has increased subsidies that cut energy bills by up to half for some of the country's largest data centres. Local governments have beefed up incentives to help Chinese tech giants such as ByteDance, Alibaba and Tencent , which have been hit with higher electricity costs following Beijing's ban on purchasing Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips.
content:

title: South Korean president calls for aggressive AI spending in budget speech
description: South Korean President Lee Jae Myung on Tuesday called for tripling the government spending on projects for expanding artificial intelligence infrastructure and technology in a budget speech.
content:

title: Biosensor technology may lead to breath test for lung cancer
description: University of Texas at Dallas researchers have developed biosensor technology that, when combined with artificial intelligence (AI), shows promise for detecting lung cancer through breath analysis.
content:
University of Texas at Dallas researchers have developed biosensor technology that, when combined with artificial intelligence (AI), shows promise for detecting lung cancer through breath analysis.

title: Microsoft unveils $15.2 billion AI investments in UAE
description: Microsoft on Monday announced $15.2 billion in investments in artificial intelligence and cloud computing in the United Arab Emirates.
content:
U.S. tech giant Microsoft on Monday announced $15.2 billion in investments in artificial intelligence and cloud computing in the United Arab Emirates.
